name: Camp Chili
ingredientsContent:
• 7-8 lbs round steak; cut into 1-inch pieces
  • 1 lb thick-sliced bacon; chopped
  • 4 cups onions; diced
  • 1/4 cup flour
  • 2 tablespoons kosher or sea salt
  • 1 tablespoon black pepper; freshly ground
  • 8 cloves garlic; crushed
  • 4 large tomatoes; chopped
  • 2 tablespoons cumin; ground
  • 2 tablespoons paprika
  • 8 poblano peppers; roasted, peeled & chopped
  • 4 cups beef stock
instructions:
1. Brown bacon in large cast iron dutch oven over medium heat. Add onions before bacon is done and continue browning until onions are soft. Dip bacon and onions out.
2. Dredge meat in flour, salt and pepper. Place in Dutch oven, stirring continuously until beef is browned. Return cooked bacon and onions to pan; add garlic. Stir and brown 2 to 3 minutes.
3. Add ground cumin, paprika, peppers, tomatoes, beef stock and enough water to cover completely. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer from 2 Â½ hours or until tender, stirring occasionally, adding a little water as needed.

name: SAVORY SALSA
ingredientsContent:
• VEGETABLES
  • 1 medium white onion; chopped small
  • 4 whole jalapenos; chopped small (2seeded 2not)
  • 3 tablespoons cilantro; chopped fine
  • 4 cloves garlic; minced
  • SEASONINGS
  • 2 tablespoons kosher salt
  • 2 tablespoons cumin
  • 2 tablespoons sugar
  • 3 tablespoons lime juice; freshly squeezed
  • 1.5 cans petite diced tomatotes; drained (keep 2 tbls.)
instructions:
Here's what you do.
After chopping all of your vegetables add the seasonings and mix well.
Taste and make adjustments to your liking. Add the 2tbls. of tomato juice.
Refridgerate to let all the ingredients come together for a wonderful savory salsa!

name: Continental Baguette
ingredientsContent:
• 1 pork tenderloin; from Pork Tenderloin Fajitas recipe, thinly sliced
  • 1 24" French baguette; (long, thin),
  • 1/2 cup spreadable garlic and herb cheese
  • 1/2 cup fruit chutney or cranberry sauce
  • 4 large Lettuce leaves
instructions: Cut baguette into 4 equal pieces and cut each lengthwise. Spread cheese onto the bottoms of bread, followed by chutney. Top with slices of tenderloin and lettuce, then tops of bread.

name: Buffalo Chicken "french Dip" Sandwich
ingredientsContent:
• 1/2 cup Wings Sauce; (See Tips)
  • 1/2 cups Chicken broth
  • 2 tbs Unsalted butter
  • 1 Rotisserie Chicken; (2-3 lbs)
  • 1/2 cups Celery; minced
  • 1/2 cups Blue cheese; crumbled
  • 1/2 cups Mayonase
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 4 ea French rolls
  • 4 leaves Leaf Lettuce
  • Pepper; to taste
  • Warm; dipping sauce
instructions:
1 Preheat Oven to 450? 
2 Bring wings sauce, broth and butter to a boil. Reduce heat to low and keep warm for serving 
3 Remove meat from chicken 
4 Combine celery, blue cheese, mayonase, and lemon juice in a small bowl 
5 Toast rolls in oven until crisp 
6 Spread each half of roll with some of the blue cheese mixture. Place lettuce on the bottom half of the rolls, top with some chicken, then season with pepper. Cover each with a top portion of the roll and serve with warmed wings sauce for dipping

name: Main - Chicken Cordon Bleu
ingredientsContent:
• 4 ea Chicken breast
  • 4 slices Swiss
  • 4 slices Ham
  • 1/4 cup White wine
  • 1 tablespoon Garlic powder
  • to taste Salt and pepper; to taste
  • 2 cup Bread crumbs; Italian
  • 3 ea Eggs; beaten
instructions:
Pound chicken until thin with a mallot.  Place a slice of ham and swiss on each piece.  Drizzle white wine on top.  Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder.  Roll the chicken around each and secure with a toothpick.
Refrigerate 30 minutes.  Dip the rolled chicken into the eggs, then into the bread crumbs, then eggs again, and bread crumbs again.  
Place seam side down in a baking dish and bake at 350? F for 40-45 minutes  --or-- fry in a skillet until crispy on all sides (about 15 minutes).

name: New York Mini-breakfasts
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Multigrain baguette; toasted, sliced
  • 2 Tomatoes; chopped
  • 1/4 cup Chives
  • 1 package Smoked salmon
  • Organic whipped cream cheese
  • 1 Red onion; thinly sliced
  • 1 Cucumber; thinnnly sliced
  • 8 Black olives; chopped

name: Asian Grilled Salmon
ingredientsContent:
• 1 each side fresh salmon; boned but skin on (about 3 pounds)
  • For the marinade:
  • 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard
  • 3 tablespoons good soy sauce
  • 6 tablespoons good olive oil
  • 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic
instructions:
Light charcoal briquettes in a grill and brush the grilling rack with oil to keep the salmon from sticking. 
While the grill is heating, lay the salmon skin-side down on a cutting board and cut it crosswise into 4 equal pieces. Whisk together the mustard, soy sauce, olive oil, and garlic in a small bowl. Drizzle half of the marinade onto the salmon and allow it to sit for 10 minutes. 
Place the salmon skin-side down on the hot grill; discard the marinade the fish was sitting in. Grill for 4 to 5 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Turn carefully with a wide spatula and grill for another 4 to 5 minutes. The salmon will be slightly raw in the center, but don?t worry; it will keep cooking as it sits. 
Transfer the fish to a flat plate, skin-side down, and spoon the reserved marinade on top. Allow the fish to rest for 10 minutes. Remove the skin and serve warm, at room temperature, or chilled.

name: Main - Baked Italian Chicken
ingredientsContent:
• 8 ea Chicken tenders; frozen
  • 1 jar Italian dressing
  • 2 cup Instant rice
  • 2 tablespoon Basil
  • 1/2 cup Peas
  • 1/2 cup Water
  • 1 cup Croutons
  • 1 bunch Spinach; fresh
instructions:
It's important to get fresh spinach!
At least 24 - 48 hours in advance, place frozen chicken in a casserole dish and pour the entire jar of Italian dressing on top.  Add the rice and basil.  Mix until all ingredients are covered.
Cover and put in the refrigerator to marinate overnight or longer.
When ready to cook, preheat the oven to 350?F.  Take the casserole dish out of the refrigerator and add the peas plus 1/2 cup water and stir.  Top with croutons (it's ok for them to soak in), and bake for 1 hour.  In the last 5min, top with the fresh spinach, cleaned and stems removed, and press it in to soak in the top bubbly layer.  Let simmer 5min.
Remove and let sit 5min and serve.

name: Pork Chops over Rice
ingredientsContent:
• 4 pork chops
  • 2 cups rice; not instant
  • 1 can chicken broth
  • 1 package french onion soup
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • 1/4 cup melted butter
instructions: Brown pork chops.  Place rice and other ingredients in a 9 x 13 dish. Place pork chops on top.  Bake covered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Uncover for an additional 15 minutes.

name: Mushroom stroganoff
ingredientsList: dry white wine or vegetable stock
ingredientsContent:
• 1 medium Onion; Finely chopped
  • 1 clove Garlic; Or 1tsp crushed garlic
  • 1 tablespoon Paprika
  • 2 tablespoons Soy sauce; Or Tamari
  • 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard
  • 3 tablespoons Flour
  • 480 ml Soy milk; or Oat milk
  • 2 tablespoons Non dairy sour cream; Or yogurt to taste
  • 10 leaves Baby spinach; coarsly chopped
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 120 ml Dry white wine or vegetable stock
  • 450 grams Fresh mushrooms; Sliced
instructions:
1. Heat wine, onion and garlic in a saucepan over medium heat until onion begins to soften, about 5 minutes
2. Add the mushrooms and continue to cook for a further 2 minutes
3. Add praprika, soy sauce and mustard, stir well
4. Slowly add flour, stirring constantly until smooth paste
5. Add milk slowly, bring to boil, turn to low heat and simmer until mixture thickens, about 5 minutes
6. Add the sour cream, salt and pepper and heat thoroughly
7. Serve over pasta and baby spinach, rice or baked potatoes

name: Grilled Indonesian Style Tofu with Peanut Mango Salsa
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Tbsp Ground ginger
  • 1 Tbsp Ground coriander
  • 1 1/2 Tsp Turmeric
  • 1 1/2 Tsp Garlic powder
  • 3 Tbsp Vegetabls oil; More for the grill
  • 1 Tbsp Sambal oelek
  • 1 Tbsp Brown sugar; Packed
  • 1 Tsp Sea salt
  • 2 Cakes Fresh tofu
  • Salsa
  • 2 Cups Fresh mango; Small dice
  • 1 Roasted red pepper; Small dice
  • 1/2 Cup Green onion; Thinly sliced
  • 3 Tbsp Fresh basil; Minced
  • 1 Tbsp Fresh mint; Minced
  • 1 Tbsp Jalapeno; Minced
  • 2 Tbsp Fresh lime juice
  • 1/2 Cup Unsalted roasted peanuts; Chopped
instructions:
Heat 2 Tbsp of the oil in a small frying pan over low heat. When hot, remove from heat and add ginger, coriander, turmeric and garlic powder. Mix together well.
Mix together Sambal Oelek, brown sugar and salt. Add spice mixture and stir well. Mixture will be a thick paste.
Press tofu to remove some of the moisture. Cut tofu into 1/2 inch planks. Coat tofu with a smooth layer of the paste and let rest at room temperature to marinate for an hour or marinate in the refrigerator overnight.
Mix together salsa ingredients including the remaining 1 Tbsp of oil. Mix in peanuts just before serving.
Prepare a counter-top or stovetop grill and oil well. Set to medium high. When hot, grill tofu planks until nicely grill-marked â about 4-5 minutes per side.
Serve hot or at room temperature topped with salsa.
Enjoy!
M

name: Asian chicken fried rice
ingredientsContent:
• 5-6 cups Cooked rice; cold every grain separated
  • 1 tbs Soy sauce
  • 3 tbs fish sauce
  • 1/2 tbs sugar
  • 3 tbs cumin seeds
  • 5 cloves garlic
  • 5 green onions
  • 2 inches Ginger roots; chopped
  • 3 tbs chicken stock
  • 1 box Fresh mushrooms; chopped
  • 2 carrots; chopped
  • 3 onions; chopped
  • 2 chicken breast; cooked
  • 2 stalks celery; chopped
  • 1 tbs lime juice
  • 1 tbs pepper
  • 1 hot pepper; chopped
  • 2 Eggs
  • olive oil
instructions:
1- Cook rice. Do not overcook. Pour some oil on your fingers and separate de clumps of rice back into grains.
2- Chop cooked chicken (previously poached with spices). In a bowl, pour 1tbs of soy sauce
3- Prepare stir- fry sauce (chicken broth, sugar, pepper, fish sauce, soy sauce, lime juice)
4- In a pan or wok, stir fry cumin seeds, onions and carrots, then ginger, then garlic, celery, mushroom and chili, then cooked chicken. If it becomes too dry, add 1-2 tbs of broth Do not overcook.
5- Add rice. If everything doesnt fit in the pan, reserve the vegetables and chicken.Turn the rice gently with a flat spatula. After 1 min, Add gradually the stir fry sauce. Stir fry 6-10 min. Keep the pan as dry and hot as possible to keep your rice fluffy.
6- Push the rice aside and scramble 2 eggs in the center of the pan.
7 - Taste and adjust seasoning (fish sauce, soy sauce)
8 - Top with raw chopped green onions and serve

name: Chicken Penne Fiesta
ingredientsContent:
• 16 ounces Penne pasta
  • 2 tablespoons Olive oil
  • 10 ounces Velveeta Cheese; cubed (about 1/3 bar)
  • 3 Chicken breasts boneless and skinless
  • 3/4 cup Heavy cream
  • 1 cup Finely chopped onions
  • 1/2 cup bell pepper chopped
  • 2 ribs Celery chopped
  • 14.5 ounce Canned diced tomatoes
  • 4 ounce canned green chiles
instructions:
Lightly season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.  Cook and slice into thin strips.
Prepare penne pasta as directed.  
In a large skillet, saute onion, celery, and green peppers.  When onion is translucent, add green chiles and diced tomatoes.  Add heavy cream and velveeta cubes.  Once melted cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes stirring frequently.  Season with salt and pepper.  
Add in pasta and chicken.  Season to taste and serve.

name: Griddle Burger with 10000 Island Dressing
ingredientsContent:
• 2 pounds ground beef
  • Salt & Pepper
  • 1 cup mayo
  • 1/4 cup ketchup
  • 3 tablespoons sliced pickled jalapenos; chopped
  • 1 tablespoon Relish
  • 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
  • 1/4 teaspoon granulated garlic
instructions:
For the dressing: Combine the mayonnaise, ketchup, jalapenos, relish, mustard, garlic and some salt. Mix well and adjust seasonings if necessary.
For the burgers: Heat a cast-iron skillet or large heavy griddle pan over medium-high heat.
Form the meat into 4-6 balls with your hands.
Place the burger balls on the griddle and sear for 1 to 2 minutes per side. Then, using a spatula, press the balls down, flattening them down as you spread them out. You want a thin, crusty burger and that's all about creating surface area.  Let the burger get a nice char on one side, and then flip so they get nice and crusty brown, 4 to 5 minutes per side.

name: Crock Pot Lasagna
ingredientsContent:
• 1 lb. lean ground beef
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 garlic cloves smashed
  • 28 ounce tomato sauce
  • 6 ounce tomato paste
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons salt
  • 1 teaspoon dried oregano
  • 12 ounces cottage cheese
  • 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
  • 12 ounces lasagna noodles; uncooked
  • 16 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese
instructions:
Brown ground beef, onion and garlic in frypan.
Add tomato sauce,
tomato paste, salt and oregano. Cook long enough
to get it warm.
Spoon a layer of meat sauce onto the bottom of
the slow cooker.
Add a double layer of uncooked lasagna noodles
(break to fit) and
top with cheeses. Repeat with sauce, noodles and
cheeses until all
are used up. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 5 hours.

name: Swiss Steak
ingredientsContent:
• 2 pounds Cube steak
  • 1 tablespoon Vegetable oil
  • 2 cups All purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon Salt; to taste
  • 1/4 teaspoon Ground black pepper; to taste
  • 1 pinch Paprika; to taste
  • 3 each Bell pepper; sliced into rings
  • 3 each Red bell pepper; sliced into rings
  • 4 each Onion; sliced into rings
  • 4 cans (14.5 oz) Crushed tomatoes
instructions:
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. In a bowl, mix the flour, salt and pepper, and paprika. Dredge the steaks in the flour mixture, and place in the skillet. Brown steaks on both sides, and remove from heat.
In a slow cooker, alternate layers of steak, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, and tomatoes.
Cover, and cook 6 to 8 hours on Low, until steaks are very tender.

name: Mac and Texas Cheeses with Roasted Chiles converted to GF
ingredientsContent:
• 4 Each Pablano Peppers
  • 1 Cup plus 1 TBSP Unsalted butter
  • 2 Cups Heavy cream
  • 1 Cup Milk
  • 7 tablespoons Rice flour
  • 3 cups Monterey jack cheese; Grated
  • 1 cup Goat Cheese
  • Kosher Salt
  • 1 1/2 pounds Quinoa macaroni; Cooked per package instructions
  • 1 Cup Bread crumbs gluten free; Seasoned
  • 2 cups Asiago or Parmesan cheese; Grated
instructions:
ROASTED CHILES
Preheat the oven to 500 degrees Fahrenheit.  Place the chilies on a greased baking sheet and cook, using tongs to turn the chilies after about 8 to 10  minutes.  Remove the chilies and place in a paper bag to cool.  This will make it easier to slip off the skins.  Remove seeds and stems and cut into strips.
MAC AND CHEESE
Lower the oven temperature to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.  Using 1 tablespoon of butter, grease a large casserole dish and set aside.  In a saucepan, heat the cream and milk over medium-high heat.  In a separate saucepan, melt the remaining butter over medium heat.  Whisk the flour into the melted butter, stirring over medium heat for approximately one minute.  Slowly pour the heated cream and milk mixture, whisking the mixture until it thickens.  Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the jack and goat cheeses.  Season with salt and set aside.  In a large mixing bowl combine the macaroni, cream mixture, and chilies, mixing gently until well combined.  Pour the macaroni mixture into the greased baking dish.  Combine bread crumbs with Asiago cheese and spread mixture evenly over the top of the macaroni.  Bake for 50 to 60 minutes, or until top is browned and it is heated well through.

name: Southern Style Pork Chops
ingredientsContent:
• 1 ts Worcestershire Sauce
  • 1 ts Salt
  • 1/8 ts Black pepper
  • 4 Pork chops,
  • 4 Onion; slices
  • 3/4 c Mushroom soup, condensed
  • Shortening; or oil
  • 1/4 c milk
  • 1/4 c Peanut butter
instructions: In a frying pan big enough to hold all of the chops at once, brown pork  chops on both sides in a little shortening or oil. Pour off fat, leaving  chops in frying pan. Place an onion slice on top of each chop.    Mix peanut butter, mushroom soup, milk, Worcestershire sauce, salt and  pepper. Pour over chops. Cover and simmer over medium to low heat for 45  minutes. You may want to move the chops around in the pan from time to time  to keep them from sticking.    Smooth peanut butter is best.  The chunky variety gives a strange  consistency to this dish.    NOTES:    *  Pork chops in mushroom peanut-butter sauce -- I originally found this  recipe in the "Womans Day Encyclopedia of Cookery." It is very easy to  prepare and makes a hearty main dish served over rice or noodles.    : Difficulty:  easy.  : Time:  5 minutes browning, 45 minutes simmering.  : Precision:  no need to measure.    : Martha Bush  : Harris Computer Systems Division, Ft. Lauderdale, Florida, USA  : ihnp4!allegra!novavax!hcx1!martha    : Copyright (C) 1986 USENET Community Trust

name: Baked Pasta Dish
ingredientsContent:
• 1 tb olive oil
  • 1 6-oz pkg mushrooms; sliced
  • 2 ts Basil
  • 1/2 ts Parsley
  • 1/2 c Onions; chopped
  • 1/2 ts Black pepper
  • 1 1/2 ts Salt
  • 2 ts Sugar
  • 2 ts Pizza seasoning
  • 1 14-oz box pasta
  • 2 ts Oregano
  • 1 15-oz pkg cottage cheese
  • 3 Cloves garlic; crushed
  • 1 8-oz can tomato sauce
  • 1/2 c Parmesan cheese
  • 1 28-oz can tomatoes; cut up
  • 4 Egg whites
  • 1 6-oz can tomato paste
  • 1/2 c Bell peppers; chopped
instructions: Preheat oven at 350. In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Cook  onions, bell peppers, mushrooms, and garlic until tender. Add tomatoes,  tomato sauce, tomato paste, water, sugar, basil, oregano, pizza seasoning,  salt, black pepper, and parsley. Simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Cook  pasta according to package directions and drain. In a mixing bowl, combine  egg whites, cottage cheese, and Parmesan cheese. Stir in pasta mixture and  pour into a 13" x 9" x 2" pan. Top with tomato mixture. Bake for 30 to 40  minutes. Sprinkle with additional Parmesan cheese, if desired.    Recipe By     : Anita A. Matejka

name: Chimichanga
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Que bueno Refried Beans
  • 2 oz Beef; or chicken, cooked
  • Guacamole
  • 1 7-inch Tortilla, flour
  • Que Bueno Salsa with Green
  • 1/4 oz Cheese; Cheddar; american or monterey, grated
  • Sour cream
instructions: Quantity of beans is #24 scoop    1.  In center of flour tortilla, place Refried Beans, shredded beef or  chicken, and grated cheese. 2. Fold envelope style, rolling with edges  tucked in. 3. Deep-fry in hot oil until golden brown. Drain on paper  towels. 4. Serve garnished with guacamole, sour cream or salsa.    Makes 1 serving    Source: Carnation Company

name: Spinach Lasagna Rolls
ingredientsContent:
• 32 oz No-salt-added tomato sauce
  • Fresh basil leaves
  • 1 c parmesan cheese; Grated
  • Vegetable cooking spray
  • 1 1/2 c tomato; Chopped
  • 5 oz part-skim mozzarella cheese; Shredded
  • 10 oz Frozen chopped spinach; thawed; drained and squeezed dry
  • 1/2 ts Onion powder
  • 1/4 ts Salt
  • 15 oz Lite ricotta cheese
  • 1 ts Dried basil
  • 9 Cooked lasagna noodles
  • 1 ts Dried Oregano
  • 1/2 ts Garlic powder
instructions: Combine 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, and ricotta cheese in a  large bowl, and stir well. Add spinach, and stir well.    Spread 1/3 cup spinach mixture on each lasagna noodle. Roll up jelly-roll  fashion, beginning at narrow end. Cut lasagna rolls in half crosswise,  using a serrated knife; arrange, cut side down, in an 11 x 7-inch baking  dish coated with cooking spray. Set aside.    Combine chopped tomato and next 6 ingredients in a bowl, and stir well.  Spoon tomato mixture over lasagna rolls.    Cover and bake at 350F for 45 minutes. Uncover; top with remaining 1/4 cup  Parmesan cheese, and bake an additional 10 minutes. Yield: 6 servings  (serving size: 3 lasagna rolls).    Per serving: 143 Calories (kcal); 6g Total Fat; (38% calories from fat);  14g Protein; 9g Carbohydrate; 10mg Cholesterol; 433mg Sodium Food  Exchanges: 0 Grain(Starch); 1 1/2 Lean Meat; 1 Vegetable; 0 Fruit;      1/2    Fat; 0 Other Carbohydrates    Recipe by: Cooking Light, Jan/Feb 1995, page 125      Converted by MM_Buster v2.0n.

name: Italian Gnocchi
ingredientsContent:
• 230 grams Greek Yogurt
  • 300 grams AP flour
  • 1 pinch Kosher Salt
instructions:
Place the flour on a flat surface, make a well in the center -like the crater of a volcano.
Mix the yogurt with the salt and stir with a whisk so that the yogurt will become like a thick cream.
Pour the yogurt into the well and start incorporating the flour.
YOU MIGHT NOT need all the flour, it's ok! You can keep some to dust the gnocchi.
Work the dough until it comes together and it's smooth, about 10 minutes from start.This dough doesn't need a resting time smile emoticon
Jump into action and with a bench scraper, cut a piece of dough and roll it out like a rope. It should be the diameter of your ring finger. Cut little pillows out of it, about 1/2" wide. Now, you have the option of rolling the gnocchi onto a carved gnocchi board or not. If you don't have one, you can use the back of an old fashion cheese grater, NOT a microplane! By rolling the pillows onto the grater,the design will transfer on the gnocchi and it will help the pasta get more "saucy".
Place a large pot of water on high heat and bring to boil. Add enough salt so that it tastes like the ocean.
At once, dump the gnocchi in the boiling water. They need to boil for about 8 minutes. Now you can start on the sauce....
Melt some butter (Use as much as you like, the more the better though) about 5T, and add sage leaves to taste, about 10 medium. As the butter browns, the sage will become crisp. 
Strain the gnocchi and saute' them into the melted butter.
Serve them and finish the dish with a dust of Cheese (I use Parmigiano or Grana Padano) and some extra sage leaves.
Enjoy!!

name: Kung Pao Chicken
ingredientsList: shao hsing rice wine (can substitute dry sherry)
ingredientsContent:
• Ingredients
  • 3 boneless skinless chicken thighs; cut in to bite size pieces.
  • 8-12 dried red chiles; cut in half and seeded (unless you like it HOT!)
  • 1 handful unsalted roasted peanuts
  • 1/2 bunch of green onion; chopped
  • 2 teaspoon garlic; chopped
  • 1 teaspoon ginger; grated
  • cooking oil
  • Marinade
  • 1 teaspoon corn starch
  • 1 tablespoon Shao hsing rice wine (can substitute dry sherry)
  • 1 teaspoon oil
  • 2 teaspoons soy sauce
  • Sauce
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 2 teaspoons dark soy sauce
  • 1 teaspoon sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon black vinegar
  • 1 teaspoon hoisin sauce
  • 2 tablespoons water
  • 1 teaspoon corn starch
instructions: Mix ingredients for marinade and add chicken.  Cover and marinate for 30 minutes.  Combine ingredients for sauce.  Add 2 tablespoons cooking oil to wok.  Cook chicken until opaque and set aside.  Add another tablespoon of oil to wok.  Add garlic, ginger, dried red chiles and peanuts.  Stir fry until fragrant and chilis start to darken.  Return chicken to wok and stir fry 1-2 minutes to combine ingredients.  Form a well in center of wok and add sauce.  Bring Sauce to a boil and stir until chicken is coated.  Add green onions.  Continue stir frying for 1-2 more minutes.  Serve on a bed of white rice.

name: Chickpea Sunflower Sandwich
ingredientsList: healthy pinch each salt and pepper (to taste)
water or unsweetened almond milk to thin
optional: sea salt to taste (i didnât need any)
ingredientsContent:

  • 1/2 tsp dijon or spicy mustard; (if using tahini instead of mayo, use 1/4 tsp)

  • Water or unsweetened almond milk to thin
  • Optional: Sea salt to taste (I didnât need any)

name: Special Meatloaf
ingredientsContent:
• 1 clove garlic; finely chopped
  • 1 large onion; finely chopped
  • 1 cup oats
  • 1 cup bread crumbs
  • 1 loaf bread; broken in pieces and submerged in milk
  • 1 egg; lightly beaten
  • 2 medium carrots; grated
  • 1 stalk celery; finely chopped
  • 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 can tomato puree
  • green pepper; finely chopped
  • 3 slices ham; (very thin)
  • 1 cup mozzarella chesse
  • 1 cup parmesan chesse
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 tablespoon salt
  • ground pepper
  • 3 tablespoons coriander; finely chopped
instructions:
1.- Lightly grease a baking dish of 7in x 11 in with the olive oil and place the slices of ham in it.
2.- In a bowl mix all the rest of the ingredients except for the cheeses (take out all the milk of the bread before you mix it with all the ingredients).
3.- Put the meat mixture on top of the ham and bake for 50 minutes at 200 C (400 F).
4.- Take out the meat loaf and sprinkle with the grated cheeses, then return to the oven for another 10 minutes.

name: Macaroni Casserole
ingredientsContent:
• 1 medium Onion; sliced
  • 250 grams Bacon; chopped 1cm squares
  • 1 medium Capsicum; chopped
  • 425 grams Tomatoes; tinned, chopped
  • 140 grams Tomato paste
  • 1/2 cup Parsley; chopped
  • 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese; grated
  • 250 grams Macaroni; or other tubular pasta
  • 4 tablespoon Sherry; or white wine
  • 1 cup Chicken bouillon; optional
  • 3 tablespoon Butter
  • 1 clove Garlic
  • 220 grams Mushrooms in butter sauce
  • 1 teaspoon Sugar
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • 1 pinch Pepper
instructions:
1. Cook macaroni
2. Fry onions,  garlic and bacon in butter until tender.
3. Put all ingredients (except parmesan and parsley) into casserole dish, mix well and cover with the parmesan and parsley.
4. Cover and cook in moderate oven for 40 minutes.

name: Pork Taquitos
ingredientsContent:
• 2 lg Garlic; minced
  • Jalapeno; Minced, to taste
  • 2 Poblano chiles; roasted
  • 8 fresh corn tortillas; Steamed
  • 1/3 c Tomato paste
  • 1 c Chicken broth
  • 3 c pork; Cooked, shredded
  • 1 16-oz can whole tomatoes
  • SAUCE
  • Salt and pepper
  • 2 tb Vegetable oil
  • Sugar; to taste
  • Sour Cream; to taste
  • 1/2 lb white cheddar; Shredded
  • 1 c Onion; minced
  • sprigs Cilantro; to taste
instructions: In a saucepan set over moderate heat oil until hot. Add onion, garlic and  salt and pepper and cook mixture, stirring, until translucent. Add  tomatoes, paste, broth, chiles, and sugar. Bring sauce to a boil and  simmer, covered, for 15 minutes.tortillas.    In a bowl combine the pork with enough of the sauce to lightly coat.    Divide the filling among tortillas, top with the garnishes and roll up.    >From Taste Show #TS4829    Recipe by: David Rosengarten Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #578 by "Master  Harper Gaellon"  on Apr 19, 1997

name: Low-fat Tortellini and Proscuitto
ingredientsContent:
• 2 pounds Refrigerated fresh cheese tortellini
  • 4 cups Frozen peas
  • 1 pound Deli-sliced proscuitto; chopped
  • 8 tbs Flour
  • 4 cup Whole Milk
  • 2 cups Parmesan cheese; grated
  • 2 teaspoons Coarsely ground black pepper
instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.  Add the tortellini and cook according to package directions.  Stir in the peas during the last 2 minutes of cooking; drain.
2.  Meanwhile, coat a large notstick skillet with nonstick spray and heat over medium heat.  Add the proscuitto and cook, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned, 2-3 minutes. Remove and reserve the proscuitto.  Dissolve the flour in the milk in a small bowl and add to the skillet. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened, 8-10 minutes.  Remove from the heat and stir in the parmesan cheese and pepper.  Add the proscuitto, tortellini, and peas and toss to coat.

name: Sambuca Shrimp
ingredientsContent:
• 1 pound large Shrimp (or Prawns); peeled & de-veined(butterflied)
  • 3 tablespoons Butter; (seperated)
  • 2 cloves Garlic; minced
  • 1/3 cup Heavy cream
  • 2 ounces Sambuca liquer; (or another anise based liqueur)
  • 1 dash salt and pepper; to taste
instructions:
Melt 2 tbsp of butter and mix well with garlic and heavy cream.  (You can refrigerate the cream mix at this point to allow the garlic flavor to blend).
In a heavy skillet, melt 1 tbsp of butter on med/high heat and saute the thawed shrimp until heated through.  Add Sambuca and flambe (if using an open flame remove from heat).
Reduce heat immediately and add the butter, garlic and cream mixture.
Simmer for about 5 minutes and serve immediately.

name: Spicy Filet Mignon with Ginger-lime Salad
ingredientsContent:
• 3 tablespoons Soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon Fresh lime juice
  • 1 tablespoon chili paste with garlic
  • 1 tablespoon Peanut oil
  • 2 Bacon wrapped filet mignons
  • baby romaine lettuce pieces
  • 1/2 Cucumber; halved and cut crosswise into 1/4-inch thick slices
  • 2 Carrot; julienne
  • 5 radishes; thinly sliced
  • 1/4 cup Fresh lime juice
  • 1 tablespoon Soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon Rice vinegar
  • 1 tablespoon shallot; finely diced
  • 1 tablespoon Ginger; finely grated
  • 2 teaspoons Sugar
  • 2 tablespoons Peanut oil
instructions:
Marinate the filet for at least 30 minutes in 3T soy sause, 1T frest lime juice, 1T chili paste, 1T peanut oil.  Then grill appropriately.
For salad dressing, combine 1/4c lime juice, 1T soy sauce, 1 T ginger, 1T rice vinegar, 1T finely diced shallot, 1T finely grated ginger, 2t sugar, and 2T peanut oil.  Let sit for 10 minutes before spreading on salad.

instructions: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Brown chops on one side, turn; stir together remaining ingredients and add to skillet. Cover skillet, lower heat and simmer 5 minutes.

name: Coriander-Pepper Chops
ingredientsContent:
• 4 1" thick boneless pork chops
  • 2 cloves Garlic; crushed
  • 1 tablespoon crushed coriander seeds
  • 1 tablespoon coarsely ground black pepper
  • 1 tablespoon Brown sugar
  • 3 tablespoons Soy sauce
instructions: Combine all ingredients except pork chops. Place chops in a shallow dish and pour marinade over; let marinate 30 minutes. Prepare medium-hot coals in grill bed. Remove pork from marinade, discarding marinade, and grill chops for 7-8 minutes, turning once. Or broil chops 3-4 inches from heat source 7-8 minutes, turning once.

name: Spicy No Pasta Shrimp Linguine
ingredientsContent:
• 6 Zucchini; spiral sliced
  • 2 pounds Medium shrimp; peeled, deviened, tail off
  • 3 tablespoons Garlic; minced
  • 3 tablespoons Ginger; minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili-garlic sauce; More or less depending on how spicy you like it
  • 1/2 cup Reduced-sodium soy sauce
  • 3/4 cup Balsamic Vinegar
  • 1 small Onion; diced
  • 2 tablespoons Extra virgin olive oil
instructions:
Prepare the Sauce:
Heat olive oil in large frying pan. Stir fry the onion, garlic and ginger for 1 -2 minutes. Add Soy Sauce, Balsamic Vinegar, and Chili-Garlic Sauce. Allow to simmer.
Prepare the "Linguine":
Set oven to 225 degrees. Remove skins from the zucchini and use a spiral slicer to create the linguine noodles. Set noodles on a cookie sheet coated with paper towels. sprinkle some sea salt over the noodles and cook for 20 min.  Remove from the oven and squeeze any additional water from the noodles. 
Add the shrimp to the sauce. Cook on high until shrimp is pink.
Pour sauce over "Linguine".

name: Meatball Sub Simmer
ingredientsContent:
• 1 24 oz. jar spaghetti sauce
  • 1 cup water
  • 1/2 28 oz. package Farm Rich Italian Style meatballs
  • 8 oz. shredded mozzarella cheese
  • 6 sandwich rolls or sub buns
instructions:
Mix spaghetti sauce and water in slow cooker; stir well.  Add meatballs (27-36 meatballs - half the 28 oz. package is 27 meatballs); stir gently until evenly coated.  Cover with lid.  
Cook on LOW for 6 to 8 hours (or on HIGH 2 to 4 hours).
FILL buns with meatballs and sauce; sprinkle with cheese.
(We used 6 meatballs per sub roll, but for a party, sub buns could be cut in half, using 3 meatballs per half sub sandwich to make 9 half-sub servings per recipe (if you use 27 meatballs, which is half of a 28 oz. package of Farm Rich Italian Style Meatballs).

name: Baja Fish Tacos
ingredientsContent:
• 12 ounces Tilapia
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons Lime Juice
  • 1/2 tablespoon Taco Seasoning
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons Cilantro
  • 4 each Corn tortillas
  • 1 1/2 cup Lettuce
  • 1 cup Cherry tomatoes
instructions:
BRUSH fish with 1 Tbsp. lime juice; sprinkle with seasoning mix. Cook in skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 3 to 3-1/2 min. on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork, drizzling fish with 1 Tbsp. of the remaining lime juice for the last minute. Flake with fork into bite-size pieces.
MIX mayo, remaining lime juice and 1 Tbsp. cilantro. Add to lettuce blend; mix lightly.
TOP tortillas with lettuce, fish, cheese and remaining cilantro.

name: Vegetable Pot Pie
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Cup Frozen mixed vegetables; Thawed
  • 1 Cup Canned chickpeas; Drained & rinsed
  • 1/4 Cup Frozen asparagus; Thawed
  • 1 Can Cream of asparagus condensed soup; Any condensed soup will work
  • 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning
  • 1/2 teaspoon Garlic seasoning; More or less depending on your love of garlic
  • Salt & pepper; To taste
  • 1 Can Grand Biscuits; 8 count
instructions:
Preheat over to 375. 
Combine all ingredients (sans biscuits) and mix thoroughly. 
Separate biscuits and individually flatten each to about 5-6" circles. 
Place biscuits into a greased cupcake pan. 
Fill each biscuit cup with about 1/2 cup of veggie mixture.
Fold sides of biscuit over top to cover the veggie mixture. 
Cook for about 20 minutes, making sure biscuits are golden brown.
Let pies cool in pan for 1 minute. 
Enjoy!!!

name: Lomo al Limon
ingredientsContent:
• 2 pounds Filet Mignon
  • Salsa Maggi; as required
  • Lime; as required
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
instructions:
1.  When buying the filet mignon have it sliced about 1/2 inch thick, if not possible flatten it out yourself when you get home.
2.  Marinate the filet using the Maggi sauce, fresh lime juice, and olive oil (may substitute with vegetable oil).
3.  Let stand for 15 to 20 minutes.
4.  Heat a skillet on medium high heat, or use a George Foreman grill.
5.  Place steak on skillet or grill and cook to desired temperature.
6.  Eat with corn tortillas and enjoy!

name: Chicken Fried Steak with Cream Gravy
ingredientsContent:
• 2 lb Round Steak; Cut 1" Thick
  • 2 lg Eggs
  • 2 tablespoons milk
  • 1/4 cup Unbleached flour
  • Salt & Ground Pepper; to taste
  • 2 tablespoons Butter; or margarine
  • Cream Gravy
  • 4 tablespoons Butter
  • 1/4 cup Flour
  • 4 cups Chicken Stock
  • 1 Clove
  • 1 small Onion; peeled
  • 1 Bay leaf
instructions: One of the old standbys, this was served in many of the roadside diners  that catered to truck drivers.  It soon became a favorite of just about  everybody.    Cut the steak crosswise into 4 serving pieces.  Place one piece between two  sheets of plastic wrap then using a rolling pin or meat pounder, pound to a  1/4-inch thickness.  Repeat with the remaining pieces. In a pie plate, beat  the milk and eggs together, in a second pie plate combine the flour and the  seasonings together. Dip each piece of steak first into the egg mixture  then into the flour mixture, coating completely. Shake gently to remove the  excess flour mixture. Melt the butter in a 12-inch skillet, using medium  heat, fry the steaks, two at a time, about 5 minutes on a side or until  golden brown on each side. Serve with biscuits and cream gravy. Each  serving without gravy contains: Cal Pro Fat    Cream Gravy In a heavy-bottomed saucepan melt the butter over medium heat.  As soon as the butter begins to bubble (don't let it brown), add the flour  and cook together for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes. Slowly whisk the chicken stock  into the butter-flour. Stick the clove into the onion an add to the sauce  along with the bay leaf. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring now and then, and  skimming as needed. Remove the onion and bay leaf before using.

name: Fish Tacos In-A-Hurry
ingredientsContent:
• Tomato Salsa
  • 2 c napa cabbage; Shredded
  • 1/4 c Mayonnaise
  • 4 sl Avocado
  • 4 Taco shells
  • 8 oz Flounder fillets; breaded
  • 1/4 c Sour cream
instructions: Bake fish in the oven following package directions. Wrap taco shells in  foil and heat in oven 5 minutes while fish is baking. In a bowl combine  cabbage, mayonnaise and sour cream. Fill each taco shell with some cabbage  mixture; top with fish, avocado and salsa. Makes 2 to 4 servings. name: Pickleslaw Cheese Burger
ingredientsList: italian salad dressing, use your favorite
ingredientsContent:
• 2 ground beef or turkey patties; grilled,Peeled, seeded and finely chopped
  • 2 slices Swiss cheese
  • 2 buns; halved and grilled
  • 1 cup green cabbage; shredded
  • 1 cup red cabbage; shredded
  • 1/4 cup (2) VlasicÂ® Kosher Dill Pickles; chopped
  • 1/3 cup Italian salad dressing, use your favorite
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon pepper
instructions:
1. Grill burgers until desired doneness. Add cheese and melt.
2. In a medium mixing bowl, lightly toss together the green cabbage, red cabbage, pickles, salad dressing, salt and pepper.
3. Add to top of burger and serve.

name: Chicken and Wild Rice Casserole
ingredientsList: long grain and wild rice mix
ingredientsContent:
• 1 long grain and wild rice mix; 6-ounce package
  • 1/2 cup onion; chopped
  • 1/2 cup Celery; chopped
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1 can (10 oz) Cream of Chicken Soup
  • 1/2 cup sour cream
  • 1/3 cup Chicken broth; or dry white wine
  • 1/2 teaspoon Dried basil; crushed
  • 2 cups Chicken; cooked and shredded
  • 1/3 cup Parmesan; shredded or grated
instructions:
Directions
1. Prepare rice mix according to package directions.
2. Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large skillet, cook onion and celery in hot butter over medium heat until tender. Stir in soup, sour cream, wine, and basil. Stir in cooked rice and chicken.
3. Transfer mixture to an ungreased 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, about 35 minutes or until heated through. Makes 4 servings.

name: Broccoli Cheese Tortellini
ingredientsContent:
• 2 9-oz packages cheese tortellini
  • 2 cups heavy whipping cream
  • 1 cup broccoli florets
  • 2.5 cups parmesan cheese
  • 1/4 tsp pepper
  • 2 tsp parsley; minced
instructions:
Cook tortellini according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, cook cream and broccoli, uncovered, over medium-low heat for 5-6 minutes. Stir in 2 cups parmesan cheese and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 10-12 minutes or until cheese is melted and mixture is thickened, stirring occasionally. Drain tortellini; add to sauce and toss to coat. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and parsley.

name: Hot and Sour Stir-Fried Vegetables (Pad Pak Priew Waan)
ingredientsContent:
• 1 sm Red onion; chopped
  • 1/2 c Green cabbage; cut into 1" pieces
  • 1 Fresh hot red cayenne;
  • 1 ts Salt
  • 2 tb Fish sauce
  • 4 tb Vegetable oil; *
  • 1 c carrots; Thinly sliced
  • 3 Garlic; crushed
  • 1 ts fresh ginger; Finely chopped
  • 1 c zucchini; Thinly sliced

instructions: * Will probably work with only 2T oil.    Heat wok; add oil. Stir-fry the ginger, garlic, and onion until soft.    Add the carrots and green beans. Stir-fry for 2 minutes.    Add the cabbage, zucchini, salt, sugar, soy sauce, fish sauce, lime juice,  and cayenne.    Stir-fry for another 2 minute until all the vegetables are tender, but not  overcooked.  Garnish with green onion and coriander. Serves 4-6. name: Chicken Tikka Pizza
ingredientsContent:
• 1 For chicken
  • 250 g boneless chicken breast
  • 0.5 teaspoon Salt
  • 0.5 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 teaspoon red pepper
  • 2 tablespoon yogurt
  • 1 tablespoon lemon juice
  • 1 teaspoon Garlic; minced
  • 1 teaspoon ginger; minced
  • 2 tablespoon oil
  • 1 For Topping
  • 0.5 recipe Pizza sauce; (see in my recipes)
  • 100 g Cheddar cheese; shredded
  • 250 g mozzarella cheese; shredded
  • 0.5 red onions; chopped
  • 0.5 tomato; chopped
  • 0.5 capsicum; chopped
  • 0.5 bunch coriander; chopped
  • 1 For Pizza Dough
  • 2 cups Flour
  • 0.5 tablespoon yeast
  • 1 tablespoon Sugar
  • 1 teaspoon Salt
  • 2 tablespoon milk powder
  • 2 tablespoon olive oil
  • 0.75 cup water; slightly warm
instructions:
Cut chicken into 1 inch cubes, marinate with all these ingredients except oil and leave for an hour. In a skittle take oil and fry marinated chicken for 5 minute on medium flame. Then reduce heat to low and let it cook about 10 minute covered until it dries. 
Mix salt to flour then add all ingredients pour water on it and knead to make smooth dough about 5 to 7 minutes. Let the dough rest in an oiled bowl, covered with slightly wet kitchen towel for an hour,until double in size. After one hour pat the dough and roll into a big circle.
Leave for 15 minute then bake for 15 minute at 180c or until dough starts changing color, take out from oven,spread pizza sauce & top with cheddar, mozzarella, onion, tomatoes, coriander leaves, capsicum and ChickenTikka. One hand full of mozzarella on the top & bake again at 180c for 15 minute or until cheese starts browning.  Keep an eye on bottom of pizza crust donât let it dark brown. If it is happening then just place a piece of aluminum foil under the pizza pan.  You have to adjust heat. After baking immediatly brush crust sides with melted butter.

name: Pizza Dough
ingredientsContent:
• -- DOUGH --
  • 1 cup All purpose flour
  • 1 cup Bread Flour
  • 1 teaspoon Sugar
  • 1 teaspoon Salt
  • 1 pkg Rapid Rise Yeast
  • 3/4 cup Warm water; more or less as needed
  • Cooking Spray
  • -- SAUCE --
  • Pizza Sauce of preference
  • -- TOPPINGS --
  • Mozzarella cheese; shredded
  • Pepperoni; sliced
  • Black Olives
  • Sliced Mushrooms
  • Spinach / Feta
  • Ham
instructions:
Directions:
1.	Put all dry ingredients in a food processer or stand mixer.
2.	With the processer or mixer running, slowly pour in the warm water, until the dough forms a ball.
3.	Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead for a few minutes.
4.	Spray a glass bowl with cooking spray; place the dough in the bowl and spray the top of the dough ball.  Cover with a dish cloth and place in a warm location.
5.	Let the dough rise until doubled in size, about 30 minutes to an hour.
6.	Spray your choice of cooking pan lightly with cooking spray.  This is enough dough for one 13x9 pan for a pizza with medium thickness, or two 12-inch circular pans for a thinner crust.  Spread the dough out evenly on the pan.  If desired, let dough rest for 10-15 minutes.
7.	Top crust with sauce, cheese, and toppings of your choice.  Bake in 400? oven until cheese is melted and bubbly and crust is golden brown.

name: Pasta Con Salsa Di Gorgonzola e Pollo
ingredientsContent:
• 2 Chicken breast; pounded
  • 2 tablespoon Olive oil
  • 1 pound Dry pasta
  • 2 cups Half-and-half cream
  • 4 ounces Gorgonzola cheese; crumbled
  • 8 ounces Mushrooms; sliced
  • 2 tablespoon Parmesan cheese; shredded
  • 1 cup grape tomatoes
instructions:
1.Put some plastic wrap over the chicken breasts and pound them until they are about 1/2 inch think.  Season with salt and pepper. Sear chicken in a hot skillet with two tablespoons of oil over medium high heat. Cook on each side for about 4 to 5 minutes or until completely cooked. Remove chicken breasts from heat, and let rest  before slicing. You may need add an additional tablespoon of oil or two to the sauce pan to saute the mushrooms. Saute the sliced mushrooms on medium high heat until they are browned. . 
2.Cook pasta according to instructions on the package.  Prepare sauce by combining half and half and Gorgonzola in a saucepan heating through. The sauce should thicken slightly. Slice chicken into 1/4 inch slices add it along with the sauteed mushrooms and the tomatoes to the sauce, and stir to combine well. Plate pasta by adding 1/4 of the pasta, 1/4 of the gorgonzola chicken sauce, and top with shredded Parmesan and choped parsley.

name: Chicken Breasts with Mushroom Cream Sauce
ingredientsContent:
• 2 5-oz boneless skinless chicken breasts; trimmed and tenders removed (see Tip)
  • 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper
  • 1/4 teaspoon Salt
  • 1 tablespoon canola oil
  • 1 medium shallot; minced
  • 1 cup baby bella mushroom; thinly sliced
  • 2 tablespoons Dry white wine
  • 1/4 cup reduced-sodium chicken broth
  • 2 tablespoons reduced fat sour cream
  • 2 tablespoons fresh chives or scallion greens; minced
instructions:
1. Season chicken with pepper and salt on both sides.
2. Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook, turning once or twice and adjusting the heat to prevent burning, until brown and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part registers 165Â°F, 12 to 16 minutes. Transfer to a plate and tent with foil to keep warm.
3. Add shallot to the pan and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add mushrooms; cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 2 minutes. Pour in vermouth (or wine); simmer until almost evaporated, scraping up any browned bits, about 1 minute. Pour in broth and cook until reduced by half, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in cream and chives (or scallions); return to a simmer. 4. Return the chicken to the pan, turn to coat with sauce and cook until heated through, about 1 minute.

name: Leftover Turkey Dinner Stack
ingredientsContent:
• 2 tablespoons oil (for frying)
  • 8 oz cooked turkey (or rotisserie chicken)
  • 1 cup leftover gravy (or 1 package gravy mix)
  • 2 cups leftover mashed potatoes
  • 2 eggs
  • minced green onions (optional)
  • 2 cups leftover stuffing
  • 1 tablespoon flour
  • 1 egg
instructions:
See original recipe: http://www.spendwithpennies.c...

name: Vegan Sandwich with Avocado, Roasted Kale & Sweet Potato
ingredientsContent:
• 2 slices whole grain bread
  • 1/2 medium avocado; lightly mashed
  • 1/3 cup baked sweet potato; mashed and cooled
  • 1/3 cup roasted dino kale*; cooled
  • 1/4 teaspoon nutritional yeast
  • Salt; to taste

name: Chinese Fried Rice
ingredientsContent:
• 1/4 c Rice wine; or dry pale sherry
  • salt and pepper; to taste
  • Oil
  • 1/4 c onion; Diced, see note 1
  • 1/4 c Fresh peas; or frozen peas
  • 2 c Rice; cooked
  • Egg cooked rice
  • 1/2 c meat; Diced cooked, see note
instructions: Note 1 - (I use a combination of red onion and green onion) Note 2 -  chinese bbq pork if you have it, otherwise cooked chicken or ham work  well    This recipe is similar to the homestyle fried rice in Joyce Chens  cookbook, but was actually taught to me by the Chinese mother of my  best friend in high school.    This is not exactly like restaurant fried rice, but I like it much  better. The key is not making it until the rice has been sitting  around for at least 24 hours after cooking.    In a bowl, combine all ingredients except salt and peas. Stir them  around until the rice and vegetables and meat are completely coated  with egg and wine. Heat the oil to smoking (use refined peanut oil  for this; if you use ordinary vegetable oil, heat until it runs  around on the bottom of the pan or wok). Dump in the rice. Stir  around with a wooden spoon or a wooden spatula until the egg is  completely cooked. This take less than five minutes over high heat.  Toss in the peas (they will cook enough from the heat of the rice).    Taste this stuff and add salt until you are happy with it.    This has *no* soy sauce in it, and if you add it, it will make the  rice soggy (there are ways to make brown fried rice, but this isnt  one of them :-). The rice will be white with flecks of yellow egg,  green onion and peas, pink onion, and whatever the meat is. Bery  pretty stuff and quite tasty.    I tried this once with egg beaters, and it worked pretty well.    Recipe by: marcy@sqwest.wimsey.bc.ca (Marcy Thompson)    Posted to CHILE-HEADS DIGEST V3 #,

name: Chicken with Artichokes and Angel Hair
ingredientsContent:
• Coarse salt and ground pepper
  • 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
  • 8 thin chicken cutlets; about 1 1/2 pounds total
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 cup reduced-sodium chicken broth
  • 14 oz artichoke hearts packed in water; rinsed, drained, and quartered
  • 2 tablespoons capers; rinsed and drained
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 8 ounces angel-hair pasta
  • 1/2 cup parsley leaves
instructions:
Set a large pot of salted water to boil. Place flour in a shallow dish, and season with salt and pepper. Dredge cutlets, shaking off excess. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high. Cook chicken in batches, adding remaining oil as needed, until light golden, 1 to 3 minutes per side; transfer to a dish.
Add broth to skillet, and bring to a boil; cook until reduced by half. Add artichokes, capers, and the chicken with any juices. Gently swirl to combine, and bring just to a boil. Remove skillet from heat. Swirl in butter, and cover to keep warm.
Add pasta to boiling water. Cook until al dente; drain. Serve chicken and sauce over pasta, topped with parsley.

name: Grilled Pork and Goat Cheese Crostini
ingredientsContent:
• 4 3/4" thick boneless pork chops
  • 1 12" French bread loaf; halved lengthwise and cut into 2 6-inch pieces
  • 2 teaspoon olive oil
  • 4 ounces garlic-and-herb flavored goat cheese
  • 2 tablespoons Fresh Oregano
  • 1 cup iceberg lettuce; shredded
  • 1/4 cup Italian salad dressing
instructions: Prepare a medium-hot fire in kettle-style grill, banking coals. Grill chops directly over heat for 3-4 minutes on each side. Thinly slice pork chops across grain, cover and keep warm. Brush cut side of bread with olive oil, grill bread cut side over coals, about 45 seconds, to brown. Spread 1 ounce goat cheese on each toasted bread slice and sprinkle with oregano. Return bread to grill, cheese side up, away from fire. Cover grill for 2-3 minutes, until cheese is heated through. Place bread on serving plates; top cheese with lettuce and then with slices of pork. Drizzle with dressing and serve with knife and fork.

name: Perfect Pork Chop
ingredientsContent:
• Any spice you would like
  • 4 3/4" Boneless pork chops
  • Salt and pepper
  • 2 tablespoons Extra virgin olive oil
  • 2 tablespoons Shallots minced
  • 1 Tablespoon Grainy mustard
  • 1-2 tablespoons Maple syrup
  • 1 tablespoon butter
  • 1-2 tablespoons Heavy cream
instructions:
Preheat oven to 350.
Take 4 boneless pork chops and season both sides with salt and pepper.  Other spices that are good are oregano/thyme/fennel mixed or you could try smoked paprika, garlic and onion and maybe crushed red pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan, preferable not non- stick, I use an iron skillet.  Definitely it has to be oven proof. Brown the chops on side #1 for 3 minutes and side #2 for 1 minute. Turn off heat and pop into the heated oven.  For a 1" chop I like 9 - 11 minutes. Remove from oven and let sit on platter while the glaze is made
Add shallots to the pan and heat over medium heat until softened.  Add the mustard, syrup, butter and cream.  Season with salt and pepper if needed.  Add chops to glaze and serve.

name: Quick Veal Picatta
ingredientsContent:
• 6 Veal scallops
  • 1/2 cup Flour
  • 6 tablespoon Butter
  • 12 Whole mushrooms
  • 2 tablespoon Fresh parsley; chopped
  • 1 Lemon; sliced
  • 1 Lemon; juiced
  • 1/2 cup White wine; or vermouth
instructions: Slice mushrooms length-wise. Pound the scallops until thin and even. Salt and pepper scallops and drop one at a time into a bag with the flour. Shake until lightly coated. Melt 3 tablespoons of butter in skillet over medium heat. As soon as butter begins to melt, add the mushrooms and  teaspoon of the lemon juice. Once mushrooms are wilted, pour entire contents into a shallow bowl and quickly wipe skillet. Place skillet back on the burner to re-heat. Once skillet is hot, add the remaining three tablespoons of butter. Quickly cook the scallops until they are brown only at the edges. Remove to a serving platter. Add the wine or vermouth and stir, being sure to incorporate the pan drippings. Return the mushroom and lemon juice mixture to the skillet and allow to simmer for a minute or two, then pour over the meat. Garnish with lemon slices and parsley.

name: Easy Cheesy Turkey Enchiladas
ingredientsContent:
• 1 Cup light sour cream
  • 1 Cup light ranch dressing
  • 1 Pound COOKED TURKEY; cubed
  • 10 8-inch Flour tortillas
  • 8 ounces Montery Jack cheese; shredded
  • 1 pint refrigerated salsa
  • 2 ripe tomatoes; seeded and diced
  • 1 small bunch red-leaf lettuce; thinly sliced
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
   2. In small bowl, mix sour cream and ranch dressing. Into medium bowl, stir 1 cup of sour cream mixture with turkey.
   3. With the remaining sour cream mixture, spread 1 tablespoon sour cream mixture on each tortilla. Top with 1/3 cup turkey mixture, 2 tablespoons cheese and 2 tablespoons salsa. Roll up and place seam side down in greased 13" x 9" baking pan.
   4. Bake, covered, 25 to 30 minutes.
   5. To serve, top with diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce and any remaining salsa and sour cream mixture.

name: Hearty Shepherd's Pie (5 Pts.)
ingredientsContent:
• 1 3/4 lbs Potatoes; peeled, cut into 1" pieces
  • 2/3 cup Fat-Free Milk
  • 1 tablespoon Unsalted Butter
  • 1 teaspoon Salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon Pepper; freshly ground
  • 1 pound Ground beef; 5% fat or less
  • 1 Onion; chopped
  • 4 cloves Garlic
  • 1 teaspoon Oregano; dried
  • 1/2 cup Red wine; dry
  • 2 tablespoons Tomato paste
  • 1 10-oz package Frozen peas and carrots
  • 1 cup Beef broth; reduced sodium
instructions:
Preheat the oven to 350F.  Spray a 2 quart baking dish with nonstick spray.  
To make the topping place the potatoes in a large pot with enough cold water to cover.  Bring to a boil and cook until they are fork tender, 10 - 12 minutes.  Drain the water then add the milk, butter, 1/2 tsp of the salt and 1/8 tsp of the pepper; mash and set aside.
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat.  Add the beef, breaking it apart and cook until browned.  Transfer to a bowl.  Return the skillet to the heat.  Add the onion, garlic, and oregano;  cook, stirring, until the onion is lightly browned.  Add the wine and tomatoe paste;  stirring occasionally, until the mixture is slightly thickened.  Add the peas and carrots; cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables thaw.  Stir in the broth and cook until the mixture is slightly thickened.  Stir in the beef and the remaining 1/2 tsp of salt and 1/8 tsp of pepper.
Transfer the filling to the baking dish.  Spread the potatoe topping over the filling and bake until the filling is bubbly around the edges, about 20 minutes.  Turn the oven to broil and broil the pie, 5 inches from the heat until the topping is lightly browned.  Let stand 5 minutes before serving.

name: Ginger Chicken Kebabs
ingredientsContent:
• 6 boneless and skinless chicken thighs; cut into 1-inch pieces
  • 2 tblspoons Canola oil
  • 2 tblspoons Rice
  • 1 tsps Sugar
  • 1 tsps Salt
  • 1 stalk lemon grass; chopped
  • 1 2" piece ginger; peeled and sliced
  • 2 cloves Garlic
  • 4 whole Scallions; cut
  • 1 tblspoons Sesame seeds; toasted
instructions:
In bowl of food processor, place canola oil, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, lemon grass, ginger and garlic cloves. Process until lemon grass is chopped fully, about 3 minutes. Transfer to glass bowl. Add chicken thighs to bowl. Cover and refrigerate at least two hours, or overnight, or up to 2 days.
Prepare charcoal or gas grill, or preheat oven broiler. Thread chicken pieces and scallions, alternating. Place on grill and cook, turning once, until chicken is firm and opaque, about 6 - 8 minutes per side. Plate on serving platter and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

name: Boneless, Herb-Crusted Leg of Pork
ingredientsContent:
• 3 1/2 lbs boneless leg of pork; (fresh ham), (up to 4-lb)
  • 1 tablespoon olive or vegetable oil
  • 1 tablespoon Paprika
  • 1 tablespoon dried sage; crushed
  • 2 teaspoons dried rosemary; crushed
  • 2 teaspoons Garlic; minced
  • 1 teaspoon Cracked black pepper
  • 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt; or 1/4 teaspoon regular salt
instructions: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Brush surface of pork with oil. In a small bowl, combine paprika, sage, rosemary, garlic, pepper and salt. Rub herb mixture over surface of pork. Place on rack in a shallow roasting pan. Roast for 1 hour to 1 1/2 hours or until meat thermometer inserted in thickest part reads 150 degrees F. (about 18-20 minutes per pound) Remove from oven and cover. Let rest for 20 minutes before slicing.

name: Baked Macaroni and Smoked Cheese
ingredientsContent:
• 2 slices Bread
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 2 tablespoons Unsalted butter
  • 2 tablespoons Unbleached flour
  • 2 1/2 cups Whole milk; (or low-fat) start with 2 cups milk, and add more as needed for
  • 1/2 teaspoon Dry mustard
  • dash Cayenne
  • 1 teaspoon Salt; (smoked salt might be good)
  • 2 cups Extra-sharp cheddar cheese; grated
  • 1 cup Smoked gouda cheese; grated
  • 10 ounces Elbow Macaroni; (or spirals)
instructions:
1.  Bring a large quantity of water to a boil in a stockpot.  
2.  Tear the bread into pieces and place in a food processor or blender to make bread crumbs.  Pour the crumbs into a bowl and drizzle with the oil.  Rub the oil into the crumbs with your fingertips to moisten them evenly.
3.  To make the cheese sauce, melt the butter in a medium-sized saucepan over medium heat.  Sprinkle in the flour and whisk until it blends with the butter.  Cook this roux for 3 minutes.  Slowly whisk in the milk, making sure the mixture styas hot as you add the milk.  Add the mustard, cayenne, and salt.  Bring the mixture to a boil, whisking continuously.  Lower the heat and simmer the sauce about 30 seconds.  Remove from the heat and stir in the cheddar and smoked cheeses (The sauce can be made up to 4 hours in advance.  Reheat gently until warm before mixing it with the macaroni).
4.  Drop the macaroni into the boiling water.  Cook until al dente, about 7 minutes.  Do not overcook it; it will cook more when it is baked.  Drain thoroughly in a colander (toss with a bit of oil if you aren't going to bake the casserole immediately).
5.  Preheat the oven to 400 degrees.
6.  Spoon the macaroni into a shallow 2 to 2 quart casserole.  Pour on the sauce and toss well.  Sprinkle on the bread crumbs.
7.  Bake 15 minutes, or just until the sauce is sizzling and the crumbs begin to brown.
Tips:
The macaroni and sauce can be prepared in advance, but they should not be combined until baking time.
The white sauce can boil a few seconds, but once the cheese has been added, the sauce must not boil or else it will curdle.  The same simulation applies to baking; the casserole should bake only until it is hot and no more.
This recipe can be easily doubled or tripled to feed a crowd.
Modified from: Vegetarian Classics by Jeanne Lemlin

name: Chicken Teriyaki Alfedo
ingredientsContent:
• 4 Tbsp Teriyaki Sauce
  • 2 Tbsp Garlic; Minced
  • 1 Tbsp Ginger; Ground
  • 1/2 Cup Water
  • 3 Chicken Breasts
  • 1 Jar Alfredo Sauce
  • 1 Box Pasta
instructions:
1. Add teriyaki sauce, garlic, ginger, and water into a mixing bowl and whisk until well blended. Pour onto thawed chicken breasts and allow to marinate for 20-30 minutes. 
2. Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes until done. 
3. Boil pasta until finished, add Alfredo sauce. 
4. Cut chicken and add to Alfredo sauce. Pour in the marinade. Mix together. 
5. Enjoy!

name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredientsContent:
• 1 tablespoon Cornflour
  • 2 teaspoons Chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon Salt
  • 1 teaspoon Paprika
  • 1 teaspoon Sugar
  • 3/4 teaspoon Chicken bouillon; crushed
  • 1/2 teaspoon Onion powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon Garlic powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon Cayenne
  • 1/4 teaspoon Cumin
  • 4 Chicken breast; Sliced into finger size pieces
  • 2 large Tomato; sliced
  • 1 Jar Salsa
  • 1 Jar Soured Cream
  • 1 16-oz can Refried Beans
  • 1 Lettuce
  • 1 package Tortilla
  • 1 large Onion; sliced
  • 1 tablespoon Vegetable oil
instructions:
Measure out and mix all of the spices together.
2 tablespoons are roughly equivalent of a shop bought packet of fajita seasoning.  This mix makes several servings so you can store in an airtight jar for future use.
I usually rub in 1 1/2 tablespoons into the chicken and 1/2 tablespoon into the onion slices (best way I've found to do this is put onion slices and mix into a tupperware tub and shake it).  Fry the chicken over a medium heat using 1 tablespoon of oil (I prefer groundnut oil).  Fry the onion in a seperate pan.
Serve with salsa, soured cream, refried beans, sliced tomatoes, lettuce and wrap in a flour tortilla.  I like to serve each item in its own bowl, the onion and chicken bowls warmed in the oven before serving.

name: Savoury Shepherd's Pie
ingredientsContent:
• 1 small onion; chopped
  • 3 small Carrot; chopped
  • 1/2 cup Spinach; chopped
  • 1 stalk Celery; chopped
  • 1 large Tomato; chopped
  • 2 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1/2 cup Green lentils; mashed
  • 1/2 teaspoon Basil; dried
  • 1/2 teaspoon Salt
  • 1 tablespoon Braggs or soy sauce
  • 3 medium Potatoes; roughly chopped
  • 1/4 cup Soy milk (or rice, dairy, etc.)
  • 1 tablespoon Butter or olive oil
  • Salt; to taste
instructions:
Preheat oven to 350. In a medium pot of water, boil the chopped potatoes until they can be easily pierced with a fork. In a medium saucepan, saute the onions, carrots, spinach, celery, and tomatoes in the oil. Once carrots are tender, add the lentils, basil, salt, and Braggs. Stir and simmer without a lid until the liquid cooks off. 
Meanwhile, mash the potatoes, milk, butter/oil, and salt. Set aside.
Pour the vegetable mixture into a lightly oiled pie plate and then layer the mashed potates over the top. 
Bake 15-20 minutes. Makes 4 - 6 servings. 
(I wasn't sure if the notes page show up on the posting feature, so wanted to be sure to add them here):
I used rice milk and it turned out just fine. Feel free to use leftover mashed potatoes or instant, if desired. Also, I did not have a fresh tomato on hand, so used 3 whole canned tomatoes and just squeezed out the extra juice. Also used fresh basil. Super yummy, comforting, and my 5YO son just raved about it!

name: Sweet Pickle Sliders
ingredientsList: chopped vlasicÂ® bread and butter chips
ingredientsContent:
• 2 teaspoons vegetable oil
  • 6 oz. ground beef
  • 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt
  • 1/8 teaspoon pepper
  • 2 tablespoons dried chopped onion
  • 3 small squares American cheese
  • 2 tablespoons mayonnaise
  • 1 teaspoon ketchup
  • 2 teaspoons chopped VlasicÂ® Bread and Butter Chips
  • 3 mini potato rolls
  • VlasicÂ® Ovals Hamburger Dill Chips
instructions:
1. Pour vegetable oil into a cast iron or fry pan and heat over medium-low heat.  
2. Pat beef into a large square about 1/2 inch thick. Cut into square patties slightly larger than the size of your bun. Sprinkle patties with salt and pepper . 
3. Add dried onion to pan and lay hamburgers directly on top of onion. 
4. Cook burgers to desired doneness, about 5 minutes and turn off heat. Lay American cheese on burgers and cover pan until melted. 
5. While cheese is melting, combine mayonnaise, ketchup and VlasicÂ® Bread and Butter Chips. Spread sauce on bottom of potato rolls. 
6. Add the chopped onions and burger patty and top with VlasicÂ® Ovals Hamburger Dill Chips.

name: Chicken Saltimbocca
ingredientsContent:
• 4 (4-ounce) chicken cutlets
  • 1/8 teaspoon salt
  • 12 fresh sage leaves; use less if they're big
  • 2 ounces very thinly sliced prosciutto; cut into 8 thin strips
  • 4 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil; divided
  • 1/3 cup lower-sodium chicken broth
  • 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice
  • 1/2 teaspoon cornstarch
  • 1 package Angel Hair; or other pasta
instructions:
1. Sprinkle the chicken evenly with salt. Place 2-3 sage leaves on each cutlet; wrap 2 prosciutto slices around each cutlet, securing sage leaves in place.
2. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon oil to pan, and swirl to coat. Add chicken to pan; cook for 2 minutes on each side or until done. Remove chicken from pan; keep warm.
3. Combine broth, lemon juice, and cornstarch in a small bowl; stir with a whisk until smooth. Add cornstarch mixture and the remaining 1 teaspoon olive oil to pan; bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 1 minute or until slightly thickened, stirring constantly with a whisk. Spoon sauce over chicken.

name: Bigos
ingredientsContent:
• 1/2 medium cabbage
  • 4 cups sauerkraut
  • 1 can Tomato paste
  • 1/2 pound Bacon
  • 1 pound stewing pork; diced
  • 1 pound Kielbasa sausage; sliced
  • 1 large onion; diced
  • 2 cloves Garlic; minced
  • 1 Bay leaf
  • sea salt
  • Black pepper
  • cooking fat
instructions:
1 Cut the cabbage in thin slices and boil until ten-der in a pot of boiling salted water.
2 Boil the sauerkraut in another pot in about 2 cups of water. Strain and keep the sour water 
aside.
3 Saute your diced pork in a pan with some cook-ing fat.
4 Set aside and saute the bacon and sausage with the onion and garlic.
5 In a large pot, combine the cooked cabbage, sauerkraut, sour water, tomato paste, spices and 
your cooked meats, onion and garlic.
6 Simmer for about 1 hour.

name: Chicken Paprikash
ingredientsContent:
• 3 pounds bone-in; skin-on chicken pieces (see note)
  • Salt; and pepper
  • 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
  • 2 onions; chopped fine
  • 2 red bell peppers; stemmed, seeded, and sliced thin
  • 1 garlic clove; minced
  • 2 tablespoons tomato paste
  • 1/4 cup paprika; (see information at left)
  • 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup low-sodium chicken broth
  • 3/4 cup sour cream; (see note)
instructions:
1. BROWN CHICKEN Pat chicken dry with paper towels and season with salt and pepper. Heat oil in Dutch oven over medium-high heat until just smoking. Cook chicken until well browned all over, about 10 minutes; transfer to plate. When chicken is cool enough to handle, remove and discard skin.
2. COOK VEGETABLES Pour off all but 1 tablespoon fat from pot. Add onions and bell peppers and cook until softened, 6 to 8 minutes. Stir in garlic, tomato paste, paprika, and flour and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Slowly stir in broth and bring to boil.
3. SIMMER CHICKEN Add browned chicken and any accumulated juices to pot. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered until white meat registers 160 degrees (or dark meat registers 175 degrees), 20 to 25 minutes. Off heat, stir in sour cream until incorporated and

name: Chicken-Corn Chili
ingredientsContent:
• 1 tablespoon Extra virgin olive oil
  • 1 Onion; Chopped
  • 2 cloves Garlic; Minced
  • 4 ounces Green chili; Chopped & Drained
  • 1 teaspoon Ground cumin
  • 2 cups Chicken Broth
  • 2 cups Rotisserie Chicken; Shredded
  • 2 (15oz) cans Pinto or White Beans; 1 can drained & rinsed
  • 1 cup Frozen corn; Thawed
  • 1 cup Monterey jack cheese; grated
  • 1/2 cup Fresh Cilantro; chopped
instructions:
1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.  Add the onion and cook; stirring until slightly soft, about 3 min.  Add the garlic, green chilies and cumin and cook for about 2 min.  Stir in chicken broth, chicken & beans.  Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 15 min, stirring occasionally.
2. Using a potato masher, mash the chili until about half of the beans are broken up.  Stir in the corn, cilantro and 1/2  cup of cheese.
3.  Serve in bowls with remaining cheese.  You can add sour cream and jalepenos on top.  I like to serve with cornbread.

name: Turkey Tostadas
ingredientsContent:
• 2 Cups COOKED TURKEY; cut into 1/2-inch cubes
  • 1 1.5-oz Package taco seasoning mix
  • water; as needed
  • 4 6-inch Corn tortillas
  • 1/4 Cup canned refried beans
  • 1/2 Cup Pepper Jack cheese; shredded
  • 1/2 Cup Tomatoes; chopped
  • 1/2 Cup lettuce; shredded
  • 2 Tablespoons Onion; chopped
  • 1/2 Cup taco sauce
  • 1 Cup Sour cream
  • 1 Cup guacamole
instructions:
1. In large skillet over medium heat, combine turkey and taco seasoning with measurement of water recommended on seasoning package. Bring mixture to a gentle boil; immediately reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
   2. Arrange tortillas on large cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 375 degree F oven 5 to 7 minutes or until tortillas are crispy and lightly browned.
   3. Spread each tortilla with one tablespoon beans. Top with 1/4 turkey mixture and cheese. Return to oven 2 to 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
   4. To serve, top with tomatoes, lettuce, onions and taco sauce. Serve with sour cream and guacamole.

name: Dad's Greek Skillet Dish
ingredientsContent:
• 1 box Penne
  • 1 1/2 lbs. Chop Meat
  • 2 14 oz cans Diced Tomatoes
  • 2 14 oz cans Chicken Broth
  • 1 1/2 cups Feta Cheese
  • 2 small cans Tomato Paste
  • 3 cups Fresh Stringbeans
  • 1 small Onion
  • 2 cloves Garlic
  • 1 tsp Oregano
  • 1 tbsp Cinnamon
instructions:
Combine in a 12" or larger skillet chop meat, garlic, onions. Cook until meat is browned.
Mix broth, cinnamon, oregano and tomato paste and add to skillet.  Add uncooked penne, diced tomatoes, and stringbeans, mix well and cover. Cook for 20 minutes on medium heat. If mixture starts to thicken too much, add additional water or chicken broth. Cook for 10 - 15 minutes longer. Add 1 cup feta cheese, mix well cook 5-10 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle remaining feta cheese over top and serve.
Goes Great with some Garlic Bread!

name: Cowboy Hot Dogs
ingredientsContent:
• 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 large yellow onion; cut into half moons
  • 4 bison* or other hot dogs
  • 4 potato hot dog buns
  • About 6 tbsp. mayonnaise

name: Continental Baguette
ingredientsList: cooked tenderloin from pork tenderloin fajitas rec
ingredientsContent:
• 1 cooked tenderloin from Pork Tenderloin Fajitas rec; thinly sliced
  • 1 24" baguette French bread; (long, thin)
  • 1/2 cup spreadable garlic and herb cheese
  • 1/2 cup fruit chutney or cranberry sauce
  • 4 large Lettuce leaves
instructions: Cut baguette into 4 equal pieces and cut each lengthwise. Spread cheese onto the bottoms of bread, followed by chutney. Top with slices of tenderloin and lettuce, then tops of bread.

name: Blackened Snapper Cajun Style
ingredientsContent:
• 32 ounces Snapper fillets; four each weighing between 6 to 8 ounces
  • 1 tablespoon Paprika
  • 1 tablespoon Cayenne pepper
  • 1 teaspoon Black Pepper; ground
  • 1 teaspoon Ground White Pepper
  • 1 teaspoon Ground cumin
  • 1/2 teaspoon Thyme
  • 1/2 teaspoon Oregano
  • 1 teaspoon Salt
  • 4 tablespoon Butter; melted
instructions:
Mix well together the spices and seasonings.
Dip the snapper in melted butter and sprinkle on the Cajun spice, 
Pan Fry over a medium to high heat until just cooked.

part-skim mozzarella or pepper jack cheese

name: Balsamic Pork Chops
ingredientsContent:
• 8 boneless pork chops; about 3/4-inch thick
  • 12 ounces balsamic vinaigrette dressing; (1 1/2 cups)
instructions: Place chops in large, resealable bag; pour vinaigrette dressing over. Seal bag and refrigerate for 2 to 24 hours. Prepare medium-hot grill. Remove chops from marinade and pat dry. Discard remaining marinade. Grill chops directly over heat for about 8 to 10 minutes, turning once. Serve desired number of chops for dinner; wrap and refrigerate remaining chops for up to three days.

name: Delicious Chicken Sandwiches
ingredientsList: reduced fat or fat free mayo
ingredientsContent:
• 4-5 Plum tomatoes; quartered
  • 2 tbs Balsamic Vinegar
  • 4 wedge laughing cow lite
  • 1/2 - 1 breast rotisserie chicken; shredded
  • 2 cups spring mix or baby spinach
  • 1/4 cup reduced fat or fat free mayo
  • 1 tablespoon coarse dijon mustard
  • 1 clove fresh garlic, pressed
  • 1 loaf French bread
instructions:
Spray a large nonstick skillet and place over medium-high heat. Add tomatoes; cook 2 minutes, turning once. Remove from heat; stir in 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar. 
Combine mayonnaise, mustard, and garlic in a small bowl. Spread mayonnaise mixture evenly over top half of bread loaf. 
Spread cheese onto other half and top with warm tomatoes.  Layer chicken on top.
Toss greens with vinegar, gently to coat. Top chicken with greens mixture; replace top half of bread. Cut loaf into 6 pieces.

name: Old-Fashioned Meat Loaf
ingredientsContent:
• 1 pound Ground beef
  • 1 1/4 teaspoon Salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon Ground black pepper
  • 1/2 cup Onion; chopped
  • 1/2 cup Bell pepper; chopped
  • 1 large Egg; lightly beaten
  • 8 ounces Tomato; diced
  • 1/2 cup quick-cooking oats
  • Topping
  • 1/3 cup Ketchup
  • 2 tablespoon Brown sugar
  • 1 tablespoon Yellow mustard
instructions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Mix all meatloaf ingredients well and place in a baking dish. Shape into a loaf.
Mix ingredients for topping and spread on loaf.
Bake for 1 hour.

name: Garlic-Herb Roast Pork
ingredientsContent:
• 1 1/2 pound boneless center-cut pork loin
  • 4 cloves garlic; peeled and crushed
  • 2 teaspoons Coarse salt
  • 1 tablespoon fresh sage; minced or 2 teaspoons dried
  • 2 teaspoons fresh rosemary leaves; minced or 1 teaspoon dried
  • 3/4 teaspoon Black Pepper; freshly ground
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
instructions: Heat oven to 450 degrees F. Pat pork dry with paper towels, place in shallow roasting pan. In small bowl, stir together garlic, salt, sage, rosemary, pepper and olive oil to make a paste. Rub garlic paste over all surfaces of pork loin; place in oven, roast for 15 minutes. Turn oven temperature down to 300 degrees F., roast for 15-20 minutes, take internal temperature using an instant-read thermometer. When internal temperature of roast is 150 degrees F., remove from oven, tent loosely with foil and let rest 10 minutes before slicing to serve.

name: Steak Tartare
ingredientsContent:
• 450 g fillet; Minced or chopped steak, all fat removed (1lb)
  • 1 tb anchovy; Finely chopped
  • 1 tb capers; Finely chopped
  • 2 tb Worcester sauce
  • 1 tb Dijon mustard
  • 3 tb Extra Virgin Olive Oil
  • 1/2 ts Tabasco sauce
  • 1/4 ts Sea salt
  • 1 tb Red onion
  • 1 tb gherkin; Finely chopped
  • 1/2 ts Black Pepper; ground
  • 1/2 tb lemon juice; Freshly squeezed
  • 1 tb shallot; Finely chopped
  • 2 tb fresh leaf; Finely chopped
  • 2 lg egg yolks; Raw
instructions: Mince or chop the beef just before you want to serve the dish to retain the  colour of the beef.    Combine the ingredients without the beef ensuring the oil is well  emulsified with the egg yolks and liquid ingredients. Some people like to  fold in finely chopped hard boiled egg whites and yolks, but personally I  dont think it adds anything to the dish. With the Worcester sauce,  mustards and Tabasco, feel free to vary the amounts according to your  palate.    Just before serving mix the meat with the combined ingredients. Adjust  seasoning as necessary.    Serve with a large pile of very hot chips or the thinner frites, some mayo  if you desire and a simply dressed leaf salad.        Per serving: 376 Calories (kcal); 41g Total Fat; (96% calories from fat);  1g Protein; 3g Carbohydrate; 0mg Cholesterol; 670mg Sodium Food Exchanges:  0 Grain(Starch); 0 Lean Meat; 0 Vegetable; 0 Fruit; 8 Fat; 0 Other  Carbohydrates      Converted by MM_Buster v2.0n.

name: Chicken Enchilada Casserole (6 Points)
ingredientsList: low fat cream of chicken soup
ingredientsContent:
• 4 boneless chicken breast halves; cubed
  • 1 medium Onion; chopped
  • 2 cloves Garlic; chopped
  • 1/4 cup Cilantro
  • 2 cups Reduced Fat Cheddar cheese
  • 8 Flour tortillas
  • 1 (12-oz) can Low fat cream of chicken soup
  • 1/2 cup Skim milk
  • 1 (16-oz) can Green Chili Enchilada Sauce
instructions: Preheat oven to 350(F). Spray pan with cooking spray. Saute chicken. Add onion and garlic. Cook until onion is brown. In a large bowl, combine the chicken with the enchilada sauce, onion, garlic, cilantro, and 1 1/2 cups of the cheese. Divide the chicken mixture among the 8 tortillas. Roll tortillas and place seam-side down in a 9- by 13-inch pan. Spread soup mixture over roll-ups and top with the remaining cheese. Bake 30 minutes.

name: Well-Dressed Pork
ingredientsContent:
• 1 1/2 pounds boneless pork chops; cut in 3/4-inch cubes
  • 1 cup broccoli; chopped
  • 2 cups carrots; sliced
  • 2 tablespoons Vegetable oil
  • 1/3 cup green onions; finely chopped
  • 2 cloves Garlic; minced
  • 1 1/2 cups white sauce *
  • 12 ounces bow tie pasta; cooked (about 5 1/2 cups)
  • 1/3 cup Grated Parmesan cheese
  • 2 large tomatoes; diced
  • 2 tablespoons Chopped fresh parsley
instructions:
Place broccoli and carrots in medium saucepan; add about one inch of water. Cook over medium-high heat until tender. Drain; set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add pork, green onions, and garlic; cook 10 to 15 minutes, or until pork is no longer pink. Prepare White Sauce (see recipe below).
Combine pasta, pork mixture, vegetables and White Sauce in large casserole dish. Top with Parmesan cheese, tomatoes, parsley, salt and pepper. Toss and serve.
Serves 8.
White Sauce:
3 tablespoons butter
3 cups milk
3 tablespoons flour
1/3 cup Parmesan cheese
Melt butter in small saucepan over medium heat. Blend flour and milk; add to saucepan. Cook, stirring constantly until mixture is smooth and creamy. Stir in cheese.

name: Barbecued Pork Sandwiches 2

  • 2 medium onions; coarsely chopped
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1-1/2 cups water
